column4: that's the first time I've seen one of those ppl leave when it was suggested...
His dad will make him play minesweeper for 24 hours straight.
looks like u are on the money there Didn't know that MS was doing IPP, that's cool.

windows needs to know how to format the data, pagesizes and margins etc, etc.
